Who is Simon?

My officical introduction

BIO

I am a full stack software developer based in Nairobi Kenya. I work with technologies like PHP, JavaScript and Node JS core languages plus a couple of front end and backend frameworks. The front end frameworks I use are React JS, Vue JS, Bootstrap, Material CSS, jQuery among others. The backend frameworks I am familiar with are Laravel for PHP, Express for Node JS etc. The databases I work with are both RDMS like MySQL, MariaDB, PosgreSQL etc and NOSQL, databases like Firebase(Firestore) and MongoDB.

Education

I did bachelor of Commerce at Chuka University, I am a Certified Information Comunication Technologist(KASNEB Certification) ongoing student. Solo learn PHP, HTML and JavaScript Certification, Andela Learning Community 4.0 developer training program sponsored by google, Andela DEVC developer Training program sponsored by Facebook, Open Classroom(Largest Online Learning School in Europe) certified React JS, Node JS, Relational Databases and Web Security developer
